Discover company information on any website you're visiting by simply clicking the DataGardener extension's icon.

DataGardener makes it easier than ever to learn more about any UK business while visiting their website, access Key Financials, Directors data, and Live Company Details in just a few clicks.

With our Chrome Extension,  you can:

▶ Find the Right Targets (as 70% of the time in Sales is wasted, chasing the wrong prospects).
▶ Verify and Evaluate the Risk of companies you find.
▶ Connect with Target using our integrated tools.
▶ Monitor 24/7 – if you lose attention, you lose money!

DataGardener allows you to do everything in one place using multiple data sources and we hold data on:
✔ 17 Million Companies (including dissolved companies)
✔ Over 5.5 Million Active Companies

✨ How we can help ✨

We help companies understand the financial strength and position of other companies they are looking to engage with, and we help during the search for the right prospects using financial information.

Credit, Risk and Financial Data

Find detailed information on specific companies:
✔Financial Reports
✔ Director Reports
✔ Company Credit Reports
✔ Commercial Property
✔ Related Companies and Directors
✔ County Court Judgments
✔ Customer Watch
✔ Company Monitoring
 ✔ Shareholder Structure and Shareholdings Held

Download DataGardener's Google Chrome Extension today and access verified and compliant B2B data. Manage Risk. Grow Faster.
